TopicTitle: Helping my teacher design a class

Articles.Content:
One of my teachers asked my to think of projects for people to do for a brand new class next year that she is teaching. I'd like to hear some of your ideas.

Details:

Class name: Earth and Space Systems

Length: 2 semesters

Grade: High school

Specifics: Projects that people can do both in a group and independently for a unit "Space technology"

If you have any more questions about the details just ask.

P.S. I bought KSP 1 year ago today (hooray)
KSP, obviously.... Have them land on the Mun!

KSP, obviously.... Have them land on the Mun!

Yeah, I am ashamed to say that it took my more than an hour to think of that.

Have them design a manned mission to mars.

Required Specifications

Life-Support

Propulsion

Radiation Protection

Mission Objectives

Etcetera Etcetera

The obvious answer: KSP!

If I become a teacher, I'd love to go to a school and ask them If I could teach an elective similar to this that uses KSP.
